review
aggregate
{$match:{ nr:@ReviewXYZ@}}
{$lookup:{from: "person", localField:"person", foreignField: "nr", as: "person"}}
{$unwind:"$person"}
{$group: {_id:{nr: "$person.nr", name:"$person.name", mbox_sha1sum:"$person.mbox_sha1sum", country:"$person.country"}}}
{$lookup:{from: "review",localField: "_id.nr", foreignField:"person", as: "review"}}
{$unwind:"$review"}
{$project:{"_id.nr":1, "_id.mbox_sha1sum":1,"_id.name":1,"review.nr":1, "review.product":1, "review.title":1, "_id.country":1  }}
